pull.title: wallet: fix key parsing check for miniscript expressions
pull.body: In `ParseScript`, when processing miniscript expressions, the way we check for key parsing error is wrong, the actual code is unreachable because we're checking it into `if (node)` (successful parsing) statement.

events.message: wallet: fix key parsing check for miniscript expressions in `ParseScript`
